patthana18.20:1.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana18.20:2.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ anāsavaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate cattāri.
patthana18.20:3.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Āsavavippayuttaṃ anāsavaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto nasāsavo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
